CustomField.formula: (ISPICKVAL(Business_Type__c, 'Private Company') || ISPICKVAL(Business_Type__c, 'Public Company') || ISPICKVAL(Business_Type__c, 'Trusts/Foundation') || ISPICKVAL(Business_Type__c, 'Regulated Firm') || ISPICKVAL(Business_Type__c, 'Government')) && Director_Count__c = 0
CustomField.label: Director Validation Error
